name: Sonic Sock Puppets - The Collection
description:
17 soundscapes composed on the iPad in GarageBand incorporating Alchemy synths, samples, and kinetic mixing.

During a trip to the US in July and August 2021, I composed this series of soundscapes while on the road using GarageBand on my iPad. The variety and complexity of these songs shows the expressive power of composing on a tablet using Alchemy synths, samples, aftertouch and kinetic soundshaping. Hearing them together here provides an opportunity to appreciate how the songs evolved and became more atmospheric as my confidence on the instrument increased.
